attributes.action: Raise Awareness Of Life Threatening Illnesses In Children
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to aid awareness to the fact there are children in the UK whom are suffering with life threatening illnesses. In raiing awareness, we aid in helping these children if you are able to sign the petition, it can show that We The People really do care for our own! You can also help by donating to 'Make A Wish Foundation' which is a charity that both researches cures to the illnesses as well as granting a wish for the terminally ill children. Donantions can make all the difference!
